DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Quality-of-life assessment cancer survivor may help determine long-term effect gynecologic cancer may help improve quality life future cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study quality life survivor gynecologic cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Describe significant quality life ( QOL ) concern long term survivorship issue woman diagnose treated early stage ovarian endometrial cancer five year ago . - Identify mechanism contribute gynecologic cancer survivorship model comparison prediction high versus low QOL associate long term adjustment survivorship . Examine social support , cop effort , self-efficacy , mean associate survivorship , performance status , age diagnosis potential predictor . - Identify compare factor predict high versus low QOL woman early stage endometrial cancer complete participation GOG-99 clinical trial . Conduct exploratory analysis examine long term QOL concern survivor randomize surgery arm without radiotherapy . OUTLINE : Patients complete one telephone interview professional female interviewer . The interview last approximately 60 minute audiotaped . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 197 early stage endometrial cancer survivor 114 early stage ovarian cancer survivor accrue study within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm early stage ovarian endometrial cancer survivor treat diagnosed five year ago Patients complete treatment GOG95 GOG99 protocols least 5 year ago recurrence disease Patients secondary malignancy treatment medical condition eligible PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Not specify Renal : Not specify Other : Must capable complete telephone interview English PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : See Disease Characteristics Chemotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Endocrine therapy : See Disease Characteristics Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Surgery : See Disease Characteristics
